meaningMnemonic: There’s a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming and your <radical>older brother</radical> is in no <kanji>condition</kanji> to escape. Your older brother has brittle bone syndrome so there’s no way he’ll be able to escape the tsunami in time in his condition.
readingMnemonic: His <kanji>condition</kanji> gets worse and you have to travel all the way to his home in <reading>きょう</reading>と to get him out.
